title: Shadow Market Bazaar Adventure #24
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Abandoned Merchant Stall
rooms.description: A cramped stall in the depths of the shadow market, lit by flickering oil lamps. Exotic fabrics hang from the ceiling, and the air smells of spices and secrets. Wooden crates and locked chests are stacked against the walls. The sounds of distant haggling echo through the tunnels. This underground bazaar has been your prison, but somewhere there must be a way out.

items.name: merchant's counter
items.description: A worn wooden counter covered in dust and abandoned ledgers

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A small brass key with a crescent moon symbol engraved on it

items.name: storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three compartments, each marked with different symbols

items.name: shadow market charter
items.description: An official document establishing the market
items.text: CHARTER OF THE SHADOW MARKET: Established in the year 1847 by the Merchant Lord Silas Blackwood. This underground bazaar operates beneath the city, trading in rare goods and forbidden knowledge. The Vault of Secrets holds the market's greatest treasures.

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A decorative silver key with intricate engravings of market scenes

items.name: merchant's locked chest
items.description: A heavy chest bound with iron and secured with a brass lock

items.name: merchant's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with daily entries
items.text: Day 127: Business is good in the shadow market. Merchant Lord Blackwood's rules keep order among us. The Vault of Secrets is said to contain the exit to the surface, but only those who understand the market's three truths may pass through the Gatekeeper's Door.

items.name: silk coin pouch
items.description: A small pouch containing foreign coins

items.name: rolls of exotic fabric
items.description: Colorful fabrics from distant lands

items.name: smuggler's note
items.description: A crumpled note hidden among the fabrics
items.text: The Gatekeeper's Door leads to freedom, but you must know the answers. Who rules this market? Where are the greatest treasures kept? What do we trade in these shadows? Only then can you escape to the surface.

items.name: tunnel entrance
items.description: A dark tunnel leading deeper into the shadow market, secured with a silver lock

rooms.name: Central Bazaar
rooms.description: The heart of the shadow market - a vast underground chamber with vaulted stone ceilings. Dozens of empty stalls line the walls, their goods long since sold or stolen. Lanterns cast dancing shadows on ancient pillars. A massive iron door dominates the far wall, covered in mysterious symbols. The air is thick with the memory of countless secret transactions.

items.name: market information board
items.description: A wooden board with posted notices and market rules
items.text: SHADOW MARKET RULES: All merchants must obey Merchant Lord Silas Blackwood. Trading hours are midnight to dawn. Forbidden goods include: stolen artifacts, cursed items, and surface contraband. The Vault of Secrets is accessible only to the Merchant Lord and his trusted agents.

items.name: wanted poster
items.description: A poster warning about thieves and troublemakers
items.text: WANTED: The Shadow Thief - Stealing from honest merchants. Last seen near the Vault of Secrets. Reward offered by Merchant Lord Blackwood. Remember: we trade in forbidden knowledge and rare goods here.

items.name: abandoned stall table
items.description: A table with various items left behind

items.name: shadow market map
items.description: A hand-drawn map of the underground bazaar
items.text: MAP OF THE SHADOW MARKET: The central bazaar connects all tunnels. The Vault of Secrets lies beyond the Gatekeeper's Door. Exit to surface is through the vault. Merchant Lord Blackwood's office overlooks the main chamber.

items.name: stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with compartments for offerings or payments

items.name: ancient gold coin
items.description: A coin stamped with the shadow market's crescent moon symbol

items.name: trade ledger
items.description: A book recording market transactions
items.text: TRADE LEDGER: The shadow market specializes in forbidden knowledge - ancient texts, secret maps, and occult wisdom. Merchant Lord Blackwood maintains strict control. All rare goods pass through the Vault of Secrets before sale.

items.name: carved stone pillar
items.description: An ancient pillar with inscriptions
items.text: Pillar inscription: 'Here in the depths, we trade what the surface forbids. Knowledge is power. Secrets are currency. The Merchant Lord protects all who dwell in shadow.'

items.name: Gatekeeper's Door
items.description: A massive iron door covered in mystical symbols and locks. Three questions are engraved on a bronze plate mounted at eye level.

password_questions.question: Who rules the shadow market?
password_questions.hint: Check the market charter and the posted rules

password_questions.question: Where are the greatest treasures kept?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention where valuable items are stored

password_questions.question: What does the shadow market trade?
password_questions.hint: The trade ledger and smuggler's note reveal what is traded here

rooms.name: Vault of Secrets
rooms.description: You've found the legendary Vault of Secrets! A magnificent chamber filled with shelves of ancient tomes, mysterious artifacts, and forbidden treasures. Golden light emanates from enchanted crystals mounted on the walls. At the far end, a stone staircase spirals upward, leading to a door that opens to the night sky above. Fresh air flows down from the surface. Freedom awaits!

items.name: shelves of forbidden knowledge
items.description: Countless books and scrolls containing secrets from across the ages

items.name: display of rare artifacts
items.description: Pedestals holding mysterious objects of power and beauty

items.name: glowing crystals
items.description: Magical crystals providing light without flame

items.name: spiral staircase to surface
items.description: Stone steps leading upward to freedom and the world above
items.text: The stairs wind upward through the rock. At the top, you can see stars through an open doorway. The surface world awaits your return.

rooms.win_message: You've escaped the Shadow Market Bazaar! Climbing the spiral staircase, you emerge into the cool night air of the surface world. Behind you, the hidden entrance to the underground market seals itself shut. You are free at last, carrying with you the secrets of the shadow market. You win!
